Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires certain elections of public officials occur on even-numbered years
Summary: Requires certain elections of public officials occur on even-numbered years.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, Pub Off L; amd ยง14, Sec Cl Cit L; amd ยง300, Al Co Gov L; amd ยง400, County L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, the second class cities law, the alternative county government law and the county law, in relation to requiring certain elections of public officials occur on even-numbered years
